text:
Claudio Báez (23 March 1948 – 19 November 2017) was a Mexican television actor. He was born in Guadalajara Jalisco, Mexico. He was known for the television series "Mundo de fieras" (2006), "A Shelter for Love" (2012) and "El privilegio de amar" (1998).
Báez died on 19 November 2017 at the age of 69.
